channel.title: Minecraft Launchers Download
channel.description:
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=QDCT5LZ9]Download Here[/url]
Minecraft is a game about placing blocks to build anything you can imagine. At night monsters come out, make sure to build a shelter before that happens. It also has music by C418! So far 2759052 people have registered and 900305 people bought the game. More stats here.
Without an official paid account you will not be able to play online, but survival mode which is still as fun is available. [b]LATEST UPDATE:[/b] Updated Client and Server to Beta 1.1_01 I will be dedicated to upload the launcher each time a new version is released.

item.title: Minecraft Launchers Download
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:26, topic:375570”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=471508.msg3449393#msg3449393 date=1293642401]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=471508.msg3448943#msg3448943 date=1293603707]

What do you mean by a moparscape Minecraft server?
[/quote]Meaning a Minecraft server put up just for members from MoparScape to play.

If it would be a survival server, I just feel like it’d fail too hard. People would cheat and the whole experience wouldn’t be fun. It’d just turn into getting angry at cheaters and creepers. If it’s free build though, there’s no point in having it using the alpha/beta client. They are buggy, slow, and building is twice as hard. Plus if it’s Classic anybody could play.

I thought you could turn off spawning abilities? Classic is fun, but survival is fun for much longer.

As for creepers, I play a SMP in my web scripting class (it’s a class server) and honestly it’s hilarious to watch your friends get blown up by sneaky creepers. And having you and 8 other people running away from a horde of skeletons and zombies laughing is why multi-player is so fun. Classic is just building, and that’s really only one aspect of the game.
[/quote]I agree. It’s much more fun to play survival mode either way, but people here would cheat and ruin the experience.[/quote]
So there’s really no way to prevent cheating…?

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Launchers Download
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:17, topic:375570”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=471508.msg3448927#msg3448927 date=1293602836]

[quote author=Lin link=topic=471508.msg3448925#msg3448925 date=1293602656]

No servers do this though, as it results in the name “Player” logging in, for each un-verified account.
[/quote]Wrong. There’s a file you can launch called “minecraft_name.jar” where you launch Minecraft but with the ability to change your name. This is useful for playing with your friends, which still counts as playing online.

Third part software?
[/quote]Most likely. I believe it came with the download for Minecraft I used.

Also, since many people here play Minecraft… MoparScape Minecraft Server? ;D Nobody would need an account, but this means impersonation can happen, along with griefing. Then again, there are server mods that can help with this.[/quote]
What do you mean by a moparscape Minecraft server?

Read full topic

Also, since many people here play Minecraft… MoparScape Minecraft Server? ;D Nobody would need an account, but this means impersonation can happen, along with griefing. Then again, there are server mods that can help with this.

item.title: Minecraft Launchers Download
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

TabbyKiller:

How I am playing single player on the beta then?

Hard to argue with that answer

The main reason Notch does not want to make it so you cannot play unless you were able to login is because of server issues in the past. Forums have been on and off all day even. Whats to say, the company’s host goes down for a day due to updating, that would also mean that NOBODY could play minecraft. Its a sacrifice you would almost need to make.

Read full topic
